<NEW>

OOC - Nice, I really wanted a Battle Unicorn toy.=
  

At this point, WHEELIE did not know what the robot was, or if they were=
 friend or foe.  The Transmetalized state of the building made him cautious=
, regardless.

At this point, keeping his weapon out in front of him as he =
transformed to robot mode, "Hey there, or so I say!  It's a pleasure to mee=
t you on this dreary day!  What an interesting place I see you at.  I think=
 Trypticon once crushed it at his kneecap."

Going on then and gazing up at=
 the Unicorn styled robot, "And isn't that point on top, make it hard and g=
et stuck a lot?  I hope it doesn't give you an ache, if you keep on smashin=
g into it to break?"

At this point, Wheelie was speaking this way on purpo=
se.  Not sure if this other robot was friend or enemy, Maximal or Predacon.=
  So, speaking in his nromal way in a tone that was sure to grate would, if=
 they were an enemy probably cause them to attack, and if htey were a frien=
d would irritate them tino explaining what was going on then to shut him up=
!
